hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# and #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #Saria's Song#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Heart Container#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Magic Meter#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Jail Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Heart Container#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #Dampé's Grave#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Game Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Nayru's Love#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Market Potion Shop#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Game Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #6# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: @ tries to read the Gossip Stone...^${12 48 06}but he's standing on the wrong side of it!

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #4# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Blue Fire Arrows#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.
